name: Enable Color Emoji on Chrome for Linux
description:
Enable Color Emoji on Chrome for Linux Without Change System Config.
See -> http://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2016/08/enable-color-emoji-linux-google-chrome-noto First!

You must install the font 'Noto Color Emoji' before use this style!
You can gei it from -> https://www.google.com/get/noto/#emoji-zsye-color 

The Color Emoji Demo -> https://eosrei.github.io/emojione-color-font/full-demo.html

Thanks OMGUBUNTU
